entry.definition: "I was like that"; i.e., I was remarked to say
an idiot, unhinged person (He is a bampot)
term of endearment(awright Ted ya wee bastirt)
drunk (I was pure bawsed the other night)
police. Can also mean penis (She's pure gettin the boaby the night!!)
Skint (I think you mean brassic = boracic)
beautiful, as in 's'a braw bricht moonlicht nicht the nicht.'
a chib is a weapon (knife, bat, wood) - chibbin is the adjective ("He's gonnae get a chibbin!")
face ("What's the matter with your coupon?")
lie down ("Cooch doon fae the night")

either an insult (You're a total cunt), as part of a threat ("I'm gonnae kick your cunt in") or as a general word for others ("Everycunt wis at Dylan's party", "It took five cunts tae bring down Steven in that fight", "Naecunt showed up to Lauren's birthday")
usually used with "pure" in front to describe something (That's pure dead brilliant!!!)
Having sexual intercourse in the back of a car (Oh my God. they were doggin'!)
A combination of dull, overcast, drizzly, cold, misty and miserable weather. ("It was a dreich day")
brilliant, good. ("that chicken soup was doss like!")
a walk (comin fur a wee donner doon yonder?)
to be scared (I am faird of the dark)
carbonated drink, woman with Red pubic hair pronounced ging-er
sore body part - (My knee is gowpin)
to stare ("wits that bawbag gockin at?")
exclamation of disgust ("Did ye see that guy bein' sick. Gads.")
Double meaning ; smelly/untidy (This place is hoachin by the way.) ; full ("this place is hoachin wae hunners eh fanny n tha' ", meaning "this place is full of hundreds of good looking girls")
being in a state of drunkenness (I was jaked last night)
a homeless or unkempt person (usually describing an alcoholic)
to be arrested by the police. e.g. He wiz totally pished an the polis liftit him
very dirty (Your trousers are mawkit!! Ya manky wee bam!!)
originally a Scottish word for dirty/smelly/horrible thing or person
acronym for 'non-educated delinquent', useless waster, troublemaker
break or disfigure (pan the windows in)
rhyming slang for deid/dead (ma dad's pan breid)
spot ( plukey wee bam-cake) haha ya spotty bastard BAM CAKE a mean wit the fukin cheese baws is tht ye couple ae fannys
very, totally (I was pure drunk last night)
to hit with a thrown object -(Some diddy just skonned the back of ma napper wi a pie)
a wedding tradition where the father of the bride would throw small change from the departing wedding car to neighbouring kids
an Edinburgh and Lothians term meaning "Look out" - (goan keep shottie while ah chorey some tabs), (shottie! thurs a car comin)
a good one (he jist goat skelpt a stoater)
heavily drunk, (He was blootered; totally stocious!)
busy, full (That pub is stowed out!)
to drink (I tanned ten pints last night!) tanned means tae trash a car tae ya minkin bastards
smash windows (I'm gonny tan yer windaes)
adapted from 'tart', as in 'I asked fae brown sauce, you dozy tat!' (absent-minded woman)
brilliant, great (chiefly Dundonian) "that mince roll was pure teckle like"
someone who doesnt wash - "eeeh! that wee guys a total tink!"
